programme.desc: This event took place on 28/07/12 and was won by Italy

programme.desc: This event took place on 24/07/2021 at the Asaka Shooting Range, Tokyo. Foroughi (IRI) claimed the Gold, Mikec (SRB) the Silver and Pang (CHN) completed the podium

programme.title: Archery’s “Fan of the Year” Finds His Path Through Autism with the Sport
programme.desc: Andrew Hornsby is the sport’s biggest fan and is surprised with a trip across the globe to attend the Indoor World Finals

programme.title: Curling’s Globetrotting ‘Beard Guy’ is a Legend in the Sport
programme.desc: Hans Madsen, a construction worker from Saskatchewan, Canada, turns to his colourful collection of 600 wigs to show his support for curling.

programme.title: Speed Skating’s World-Famous Pep Band
programme.desc: Kleintje Pils – literally ‘little beer’ in Dutch – is THE popular can’t miss staple of Winter Olympic Games and speed skating competitions.

programme.title: Anatomy of an Archer: The Hidden Strengths of Atanu Das
programme.desc: We took India’s top archer Atanu Das to a sports science labs to uncover the hidden strength of an Olympic archer. With the help of fellow Olympian Lolo Jones, each episode of our sports science original series Anatomy of studies the powers and physiques of an elite athlete to find out what makes them special in their sport.

programme.title: Women's Shooting 25m Pistol Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Anna Korakaki wins gold for Greece, Monika Karsch brings Germany the silver medal and Heidi Diethelm Gerber wins bronze for Switzerland in the women's shooting 25m pistol final at the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016

programme.title: India’s Top Pistol Shooter Manu Bakher | Jee Jan Se
programme.desc: Throughout her childhood and teenage years, Manu Bakher switched sports half a dozen times. When she started practicing air pistol shooting, she knew this was the one for her. This is her amazing story.

programme.title: Men's Archery Individual Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Ku Bonchan wins the Gold for the Republic of Korea, Jean-Charles Valladont the Silver for France and Brady Ellison the Bronze for the USA in the men's archery individual final at the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016

programme.title: Shakti: India’s Super Women
programme.desc: The inspiring stories of four top Indian female athletes who have faced unmatched obstacles in order to triumph at the high levels. Shakti features wrestler Sakshi Malik, gymnast Dipa Karmakar, karateka Sandhya Shetty and archer Deepika Kumari. Watch Now”
